emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 23, 1961, pg. 3, reads: "Race Problem Here - Manchester Neighborhood House has a race problem because the board of directors is maintaining segregated dancing, although more than 25 other activities are open to all. Residents are protesting the segregation, which the Neighborhood House maintains is in effect to 'achieve a greater degree of integration.' - Harris Photo."
